video.title: Aoki Hagane no Arpeggio: Ars Nova
video.synopsis: Seventeen years after a fleet of artificially intelligent ships invaded the seas, a young man takes command of one of the vessels and fights back.

episodes.synopsis: After humanity lost much of its land due to rising sea levels caused by global warming, the Fleet of Fog established dominion over the high seas.
episodes.title: Those with Shipping Routes

episodes.synopsis: Now the captain of I-401, Gunzou sets course for Yokosuka after accepting a mission from the Japanese government.
episodes.title: Into the Storm

episodes.synopsis: Triumphant over Takao, I-401 enters the Port of Yokosuka to receive a sample of the top-secret warhead developed by the Japanese government.
episodes.title: The Fortress Port of Yokosuka

episodes.synopsis: Yokosuka is now under attack by the fast battleships Kirishima and Haruna. I-401 sets sail to intercept them within the defensive barrier.
episodes.title: Assault on Yokosuka

episodes.synopsis: Defeated by I-401, Haruna has managed to retain her mental model form, but only Kirishima's union core has survived.
episodes.title: Not Human

episodes.synopsis: As Haruna and Kirishima attempt to befriend Makie, Kamikage fears that Makie may fall into the Fog's hands and orders a special forces assault.
episodes.title: Arpeggio of Blue Steel

episodes.synopsis: I-401 heads to her secret home port with Makie, Haruna and Kirishima on board. There, they find the heavy cruiser, Takao, waiting for them.
episodes.title: Iwoto

episodes.synopsis: Iwo Jima has been surrounded by the Fleet of Fog's Eastern Patrol Fleet 1. Gunzou invites the mental model Kongou to the island to speak with her.
episodes.title: House of Dolls

episodes.synopsis: As missiles rain down on Iwo Jima, the Mental Models work together to withstand the attack from the Fog's East Patrol Fleet One.
episodes.title: Desperate Escape

episodes.synopsis: I-401 has been hit with two corrosive torpedoes in an ambush by Iona's sister ships, I-400 and I-402, and its repair programs are impaired.
episodes.title: Devotion of Self

episodes.synopsis: Restored and strengthened by Takao's sacrifice, 401 forges on to America with 400 and 402 in pursuit. The sister ships meet in the waters of Hawaii.
episodes.title: Sisters

episodes.synopsis: Absorbing Maya and light cruisers has given Kongou unprecedented power, which she uses to obliterate the Fog's U.S. Pacific Fleet.
episodes.title: The Power to Open a Path
